# init(textCell:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a text field cell that displays the specified string.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(textCell string: String)
```

## Parameters

- **string**: The string that the text field cell displays.

## Return Value

A text field cell that displays a string.

## Creating a Text Field Cell

- **init(coder:)**: Initializes a text field cell from data in the provided unarchiver.
